Shared gt arguments

Source: R/util-gt.R
gt-shared.Rd

#' @description

Arguments

data

A gt_tbl object.

columns

Columns to target for formatting.

Value

An object of class gt_tbl.

Details

Reusable definitions of common gt arguments.

On this page
